name: Squaring the Circle (Fallenspring Games)
description:
In this geometric world, the assumption is that everyone with a square body is pink and everyone with a circular body is blue. Polly is pink, but those around her choose to fixate on her circular exterior instead. She goes on a journey to change her outside to better match how she feels on the inside, making friends and discovering things about herself along the way.

This is a love letter to those transitioning to become their most authentic selves. Liberation requires many things, but begins inside yourself. May you each find courage and serenity in these terrifying and joyful times.
